member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory4.EncryptPackage
member.summary: Creates an encrypted Windows app package from an unencrypted one.
member.param: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.
A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
Files exempted from the package writer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory4
member.summary: Creates objects for encrypting Windows app packages and bundles.
